A new year ' s Ecomobile event will be held in Kirov on Saturday

Society
22 December 2023 13:12
449
Kirova ' s residents are invited to participate in the end of this year ' s debris collection exercise. The event will take place on Saturday, 23 December, from 10 to 12 hours at Lenin Street, D. 102B. (Wath Philharmonia).

Alexander Sokolov participated in the meeting of the Coordinating Council on Interaction with the First Movement

Society
22 December 2023 12:45
558
Ether 21.12.2023 in 21.05 (video)
The Governor of Kirov province, Alexander Sokolov, participated in a meeting of the Coordinating Council on Interaction with the Russian Movement of Children and Youth, the First Movement. The organization has been working in Russia for over a year and has become one of the largest youth projects.

In Kirov, the village of Kirov, the city of labor, was opened.

1 550

Preventive fire safety raids are under way in Kirov

Society
22 December 2023 11:35
404
In the run-up to the New Year, in the private sector, Kirova conducts domestic fire safety raids. Thermal and gas heating housewives are circumvented by the thermal and inspection department. 45 homeowners are given instructions

Society
22 December 2023 11:15
410
07.35 (video)
In the regional government, the results of the work of the road, HCF and the construction industry were summarized. What results have been achieved this year?

In Kirov province, another measure of support for family members of PSB members was introduced

Society
22 December 2023 9:57
628
Governor Alexandre Sokolov reported in his telegram-canal on the strengthening of regional assistance to the Kirov defender in the SVR area. In Kyrov province, another payment has been made to compensate for the cost of food to the child of a PSB participant attending regional colleges and technical courses.

Kyrjan will join the Family Project

22 December 2023 9:30
387
As the first assignment, the organizers offer the whole family to dress up a new year's tree.

In the Vita Poles, the lights were lit on the main new day.

Society
21 December 2023 19:15
489
Ether 21.12.2023 at 17.30 (video)
The lights on the main new year's tree were lit the previous day in the Vita Poles. In a pre-marital week, the city visited Des Moros himself and other magicians, without which it is no longer possible to present the most good holiday of the year.
